descriptions.feature1: Track your cycle directly in Telegram
descriptions.feature2: The encryption feature with smart contracts ensures that the data belongs only to you
descriptions.feature3: For taking care of your health, participating in loyalty programs, and subscribing to doctors' channels

header_tracker.no_last_period_date: To use the tracker, update the date of your last period
header_tracker.menstruation_start_message: Menstruation may start and will last for
header_tracker.pregnancy_chance: There is a chance of getting pregnant
header_tracker.default_event_message: Date of last period is not specified
recommendations: Today is the first day of your period, dear. Treat yourself to a hot bath and chocolate! 🍫
Today is a comfortable day: wear cozy clothes, watch series, and relax
Today is yoga and smoothie day! Light stretching and a tasty drink with spinach 🧘‍♀️
Today is movie day! Wrap yourself in a blanket, watch a movie, and eat popcorn 🍿
Last day! Get a manicure, a face mask, and treat yourself to some self-care 💅
Today is an active day! A walk in the park or a dance class for energy 🌳
Today start a hobby or project, eat vegetables and protein for energy
Today treat yourself to a dessert and favorite activity, relax and enjoy 🍰
Today is spa day! A moisturizing mask and glowing skin, enjoy ✨
Today is beauty day! Dress up, even if it's just for yourself, plan a date 💃
Today is workout day! Feel strong and eat antioxidants 🏋️‍♀️
Today is creativity day! Write, draw, engage in something inspiring 🎨
Today relax! A massage or bath with candles before ovulation 🛀
Today is ovulation! Enjoy romance or solo pleasure ❤️
Today is yoga! Stay calm and balance your emotions 🧘‍♀️
Today is tea and fiber day! Drink herbal tea and eat foods to reduce bloating ☕
Today is skincare day! A moisturizing mask and lots of water for a glow 💧
Today is meditation! Practice meditation or deep breathing for calmness 🧘
Today is dinner! Meet friends or family to lift your spirits 🍽️
Today is creativity! Engage in crafts or decor for creativity ✂️
Today is rest! Listen to your body, relax with a good book or movie 📚
Today is soup day! Eat a hearty soup or stew for comfort and nutrition 🍲
Today is bath day! A relaxing bath with lavender for calmness 🛀
Today is journal day! Keep a journal or take a nature walk for harmony 🌿
Today is preparation day! Stock up on your favorite menstrual products
Today is light yoga! Exercise and hydration to ease premenstrual pain 🧘‍♀️
Today is coziness! Relax at home with a warm drink and your favorite show ☕
Today is self-care! Reflect and set goals for the next month 🌟

subscribe_channels_card.title: Subscribe to Channels

calendar.saving_to_blockchain: Saving data to blockchain (up to 30 seconds)

earn.init_blockchain: Create your account in Blockchain TON (about 30 seconds)
earn.private_key_info: The private key is used to encrypt your data in the TON blockchain. Only you have access to the key. Later we will add the possibility of key import.

telegram.start_message:
Dear,

💡 Convenient: no need for a separate app
🔒 Secure: data is encrypted with a smart contract
🌿 Smart: Personalized well-being recommendations based on your cycle via the bot

With love, your @femaleton team
